item.title: Upcoming Fight Aug 10
item.description: Bohachuk vs Ortiz Tjis will be an interesting fight ABOVE: Beata Mierzwa combines science and art by creating illustrations and science-inspired fashion that engages scientists and general audiences alike. IF/THEN COLLECTION Beata Mierzwa studies cell division as a postdoctoral researcher at the University of California San Diego. In 2013, she founded Beata Science Art, a science art brand where she produces science illustrations, fashion, and other interactive content to help bring out the beauty in science.
